original_title: 烈車戦隊トッキュウジャーVSキョウリュウジャー
overview: ToQger vs. Kyoryuger will see the twelve rangers from both teams join forces to fight against an evil super giant. They must also save the Galaxy Line, which is falling from space. To make matters worse, the five main ToQgers are turned into children by a Shadow Monster.
title: Ressha Sentai ToQger vs. Kyoryuger: The Movie
